com.xceptance.xlt.nocoding.scriptItem.action.subrequest

Class Downloader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xceptance.xlt.nocoding.scriptItem.action.subrequest.Downloader

  • public class Downloader
extends java.lang.Object
    Loads all the static content stuff with a passed XltWebClient, distributed on some threads. For this the StaticContentDownloader is used.
